doc.field: News release: Luncheon address by H.E. Ambassador Clovis Maksoud, permanent observer of the League of Arab States to the United Nations, at a luncheon honoring the deported mayors of Hebron and Halhul and the Muslim judge of Hebron, at the United Nations
